text.content:
Clipped your Hand

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success].

Melee

Oopsie!

You hit yourself instead of the target.

Ranged

Ingrown Nail

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit]{-1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit}.

Unarmed

Clatto Verata Necktie

You critically hit your nearest ally.

Spell
